DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect new motion correction algorithm image quality diagnostic utility unselected patient undergo coronary cardiac compute tomography , investigate motion correction algorithm compensate usual use intravenously medication ( beta-blockers ) scan .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Snapshot Freeze Cardiac CT Image Quality
DOC.detailed_description: Aims : To investigate motion correction algorithm Snapshot-Freeze ( SSF ) compare standard reconstruction ( STD ) patient randomize receive beta-blockers ( BB ) beta-blockers ( non-BB ) coronary CT angiography ( CCTA ) , investigate SSF replace BB . Methods : The study include 140 consecutively recruited patient schedule CCTA rule coronary artery disease . The inclusion criterion : age ≥ 18 year , Glomerular filtration rate ≥ 60 mL/min , Heart Rate 60 85 bpm scan . The exclusion criterion : irregular heart rhythm history allergic reaction contrast agent . Patients randomized BB group non-BB group . The trial comply Declaration Helsinki approve local ethic committee . Written inform consent obtain patient . Image quality score : The evaluation perform accord Likert score follow : 1 : excellent , motion artifact , clear delineation segment ; 2 : good , minor artifact , mild blur segment ; 3 : adequate , moderate artifact , moderate blurring without structure discontinuity ; 4 : poor non-diagnostic , double discontinuity course segment , prevent evaluation produce vessel structure differentiable . In case image quality le excellent ( Likert score 2-4 ) , reader note reason ( ) observe artifact . Statistical analysis : Quantitative variable express mean ± standard deviation , categorical value frequency percentage . Values Likert score dichotomize excellent vs. non-excellent ( Likert score 1 vs. 2-4 ) , diagnostic vs. non-diagnostic ( Likert score 1-3 vs. 4 ) . McNemar 's test perform test categorical variable separately per-vessel per-patient level . Analyses segment calculate Wilcoxon signed-rank test .
DOC.criteria: age ≥ 18 year , glomerular filtration rate ≥ 60 mL/min , heart rate 60 85 bpm scan irregular heart rhythm history allergic reaction contrast agent
